valueProposition.title: Unforgettable Comfort, Unbeatable Location
valueProposition.description1: Welcome to DioVista, an exclusive penthouse in the heart of Alcalá, where luxury meets serenity. Designed to offer a unique experience, our accommodation combines a modern and cozy interior design with a spectacular terrace that will give you panoramic ocean views and breathtaking sunsets.
valueProposition.description2: Every detail has been carefully selected to ensure your maximum comfort. From the fully equipped kitchen to the comfortable rooms, everything is designed to make you feel at home, but with the Atlantic at your feet. Wake up to the sound of the waves, have breakfast under the Tenerife sun, and end the day with a toast in your private paradise.

gallery.title: Interior
gallery.subtitle: A visual tour of the rooms and details that make our penthouse a unique place.

services.title: Features and Services
services.subtitle: Amenities to make you feel at home.

features.title: Why you'll love this place
features.subtitle: Everything you need for a perfect vacation.

items.title: Private Terrace
items.description: A spacious area for sunbathing, enjoying an outdoor dinner, or simply relaxing while contemplating the sea.

items.title: Perfect Location
items.description: Just steps from the beach, natural pools, restaurants, and shops. All the charm of Alcalá at your fingertips.

items.title: Spectacular Views
items.description: From the terrace and living room, you can enjoy uninterrupted views of the ocean and the island of La Gomera.

items.title: Modern Comfort
items.description: Completely renovated and equipped with all modern amenities to ensure an unforgettable stay.

explore.title: Explore the Area
explore.subtitle: A world of beauty and adventure at your fingertips.

items.title: The Charm of Alcalá
items.description: Stroll through the quiet streets of this authentic fishing village, discover its square, and enjoy its relaxed atmosphere.

items.title: Alcalá Beach
items.description: A cozy black sand beach ideal for a refreshing swim, just a few minutes' walk from the penthouse.

items.title: Enchanting Coastline
items.description: Walk along the promenade that connects several natural saltwater pools, perfect for the whole family.

items.title: Méndez Beach
items.description: A small hidden cove, ideal for those seeking tranquility and a more intimate contact with the sea.

items.title: Adventures Beyond
items.description: A short drive away, the majestic cliffs of Los Gigantes and the Teide National Park await you.

restaurants.title: Local Gastronomy
restaurants.subtitle: Savor the best of Canarian and international cuisine.

sports.title: Activities for Athletes
sports.subtitle: Stay active and enjoy the natural surroundings.

items.title: Promenade
items.description: A perfect route for walking, running, or cycling by the sea.

items.title: Surfing
items.description: A short drive away, catch the waves of Tenerife and enjoy one of the most popular sports on the island.

items.title: Golf
items.description: A few minutes' drive away, you'll find world-class golf courses with spectacular views.

items.title: Tennis
items.description: Enjoy a match at the local tennis courts available for all levels.

items.title: Diving
items.description: Explore the rich marine life of Tenerife with nearby dive centers offering excursions for everyone.

items.title: Beach Volleyball
items.description: Play a game of beach volleyball on the sand by the sea, a perfect activity to enjoy with a group.

cta.title: Booking Request Form
cta.description: The price per night is €150 for two people, and €20 for each additional person. Send us your request, and we will contact you shortly to confirm availability. If you prefer to contact by phone, you can call +420 730 893 416.

form.name: Full name
form.success_description: Thank you for your interest. We will be in touch with you soon.
form.error_description: Could not send your request. Please try again later.

footer.description: Your exclusive retreat in Alcalá, Tenerife. Enjoy unforgettable views and a luxury stay.
